Monster ID7396

The Malevolent Mage is a superior variant of the Infernal Mage. It has a chance of spawning once after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Weapons and armour
    • 1.3 Elemental runes
    • 1.4 Catalytic runes
    • 1.5 Coins
    • 1.6 Superior Slayer tertiary
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 Trivia

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 31,289 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Malevolent Mage kill is worth 48,298.02.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 February 2017
(update | poll)

The malevolent mage was given a graphical update to be more distinguishable from their regular variant.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text refers to the song "The Evil That Men Do" by Iron Maiden.
